div.p: To the Aurelii Sarapion, son of Aphynchis, and - - -, son of - - -, and Harpocration, son of Nilus, the three contractors of the fishing tax [of the city (and) the Oxyrhynchite nome], from the Aurelii Ammonius, son of Sarapammon, and - - -, son of - - -, both from the glorious city of the Oxyrhynchites. Of our own volition we offer to lease for - - - the right to fish in the waters left by the past Nile flood - - - in the Oxyrhynchite nome, starting from - - -. Translation: P.Leid.Inst. 1 60
